name: Aliens vs Predators
description:
This game is still in very early development!

Synopsis

The year is 2033 and the Weyland-Yutani corporation has discovered a new habitable world within rang of their deep space colonial ships.

They have sent their first crew to start the transforming process on planet LV-420.

Upon arrival they discovered that they are not the only ones interested in claiming the planet as their own.

The Xenomorphs have been laying dormant until the arrival of the humans.

The Yautja have set their eyes on this planet as their new hunting grounds after detecting human and Xeno activity.

Gameplay

This is a real time strategy game that took a lot of inspiration from the old Aliens vs Predator: Extinction PlayStation game.

This game is purely focused on Single or Multiplayer skirmishes between the three factions: Humans, Predators, and Xenomorphs.

Controls

W: Pan camera forward
S: Pan camera backwards
A: Pan camera left
D: Pan camera right

Q (Hold): Rotate camera clockwise
E (Hold): Rotate camera anti-clockwise

Left Click: Select unit
Left Click + Drag: Select multiple units
Right Click: Move unit to target or location / Attack target
Middle button (Hold): Rotate camera

Numbers [1] to [4]: Activate ability

Escape: Pause menu

F5: Quick save
F9: Quick load

Developer notes

Dev start date: 22 July 2021
Game engine: Unity 2020.3.5f1

Assets used:

  • Placeholder

Credits

Lead developer - James Joubert
